channel.title: Events on STS-I at USD
channel.description: Recent content in Events on STS-I at USD

item.title: Inaugural meeting on April 29th
item.description:
Discover more about STS-I at an upcoming talk hosted by the Humanities Center. This event will be recorded for your convenience, and weâ€™ll be sharing further details soon. Also, stay tuned for proposals related to the planned curriculum for a Science and Technology Studies minor at the University of San Diego!

The STS-I’s board of directors would like to extend their deepest gratitude to the Humanities Center at the University of San Diego. This event would not be possible without their support.
